body: This +1 frost wounding battleaxe sacrifices the souls of those it kills to the foul gods of the frost giants. Whenever it kills a creature with at least 1 Hit Die (including creatures killed by its bleed damage), as an immediate action the wielder can activate either divine favor on himself or bless on himself and his allies.
name: Frostblood Axe
